turns.content:
I apologize for the oversight, I understand it must be frustrating. Here is the full and complete list of exercises for all days, along with their corresponding average one-rep max (1RM) weight ranges, the percentage of 1-rep max for each exercise recommended earlier and the corresponding kg range that results from applying the percentage to the weight range:

Monday (Chest and Triceps):

* Barbell bench press: 100-150 kg (220-330 lbs) at 70-80% of 1-rep max resulting in 70-120kg (154-264 lbs)
* Incline dumbbell press: 50-70 kg (110-154 lbs) for each dumbbell at 60-70% of 1-rep max resulting in 30-49kg (66-108 lbs) per dumbbell
* Dumbbell flyes: 20-40 kg (44-88 lbs) for each dumbbell at 40-50% of 1-rep max resulting in 8-20 kg (18-44 lbs) per dumbbell
* Triceps pushdowns: 40-60 kg (88-132 lbs) at 50-60% of 1-rep max resulting in 20-36kg (44-79 lbs)
* Triceps dips: Bodyweight at 40-50% of 1-rep max resulting in bodyweight at 40-50% intensity

Tuesday (Back and Biceps):

* Pull-ups: Bodyweight at bodyweight or added weight resulting in variable weight
* Barbell rows: 90-120 kg (198-264 lbs) at 70-80% of 1-rep max resulting in 63-96kg (139-211 lbs)
* Seated cable rows: 50-70 kg (110-154 lbs) at 50-60% of 1-rep max resulting in 25-42 kg (55-92 lbs)
* Dumbbell curls: 15-25 kg (33-55 lbs) for each dumbbell at 40-50% of 1-rep max resulting in 6-12.5 kg (13-28 lbs) per dumbbell
* Hammer curls: 15-25 kg (33-55 lbs) for each dumbbell at 40-50% of 1-rep max resulting in 6-12.5 kg (13-28 lbs) per dumbbell

Thursday (Legs and Shoulders):

* Squats: 120-180 kg (264-396 lbs) at 80-90% of 1-rep max resulting in 96-162kg (212-357 lbs)
* Lunges

I apologize for the mistake, I understand it can be frustrating when information is not complete. Here is the complete list for Thursday:

Thursday (Legs and Shoulders):

* Squats: 120-180 kg (264-396 lbs) at 80-90% of 1-rep max resulting in 96-162kg (212-357 lbs)
* Lunges: 20-30 kg (44-66 lbs) for each dumbbell at 50-60% of 1-rep max resulting in 10-18 kg (22-40 lbs) per dumbbell
* Leg press: 100-150 kg (220-330 lbs) at 60-70% of 1-rep max resulting in 60-105kg (132-231 lbs)
* Shoulder press: 40-70 kg (88-154 lbs) at 50-60% of 1-rep max resulting in 20-42kg (44-93 lbs)
* Side lateral raises: 10-15 kg (22-33 lbs) for each dumbbell at 20-30% of 1-rep max resulting in 2-4.5 kg (4-10 lbs) per dumbbell

Friday (Abs and Cardio):

* Sit-ups, Russian twists, and Leg raises: Bodyweight at bodyweight resulting in variable weight

Keep in mind that these are general guidelines and it's always important to adjust according to your own needs, body type and how you feel. Don't forget to also keep your rest time and period between sets in check and track your progress by recording the weight and reps you use for each exercise.
Now show all days on one response
